entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 18.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 18. Wind chill near minus 24. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Sunny. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 3 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EDT Monday 13 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Clear. Low minus 15.
